title: Fix the malformed test transforming an item allows access to metadata value
body:
Fixes [`#1764`](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/1764)

### Context


### Changes Made
Update <i Include=""@(h->'%(identity))""> to  <i Include=""@(h->'%(identity)')"">
Original item expands to a literal string rather than a transform of the h item.

### Testing
Passed

commit.message: Fix the malformed test that is transforming an item allows access to metadata value
